articles.title: Naomi Osaka withdraws from Wimbledon citing a 'leg injury' after labelling Grand Slam an 'exhbition' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The former world No 1 has previously admitted that she was unlikely to compete at the Grand Slam in South London after it was stripped of its ranking points.
articles.content:
Naomi Osaka has pulled out of Wimbledon this year, citing a 'leg injury'.
The former world No 1 has previously admitted that she was unlikely to compete at the Grand Slam after it was stripped of it… [+3672 chars]

articles.title: Everton takeover truth clear for US investors and Farhad Moshiri despite £1bn issue - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Analysis from Dave Powell as US investors are looking to take over the running of Everton from Farhad Moshiri
articles.content:
Farhad Moshiri's reign as owner of Everton could end in the coming months.
The 2021/22 season proved to be one of tumult and mostly misery for Toffees fans as the club's off-field financial issues, … [+9221 chars]
